template.description: Usada para listar cartões em um formulário.

templates.template:
<z:cardlist id="${id}" label="#{${msgs}.${key}}" var="${varName}" value="#{${backingBean}.${dataModel}}" rows="10" > <f:ajax event="beforeAdd" listener="#{${backingBean}.${beforeAdd}(${varName})}" /> <f:ajax event="afterAdd" listener="#{${backingBean}.${afterAdd}(${varName})}" /> <f:ajax event="beforeEdit" listener="#{${backingBean}.${beforeEdit}(${varName})}" /> <f:ajax event="afterEdit" listener="#{${backingBean}.${afterEdit}(${varName})}" /> <f:ajax event="beforeInsert" listener="#{${backingBean}.${beforeInsert}(${varName})}" /> <f:ajax event="afterInsert" listener="#{${backingBean}.${afterInsert}(${varName})}" /> <f:ajax event="beforeUpdate" listener="#{${backingBean}.${beforeUpdate}(${varName})}" /> <f:ajax event="afterUpdate" listener="#{${backingBean}.${afterUpdate}(${varName})}" /> <f:ajax event="beforeDelete" listener="#{${backingBean}.${beforeDelete}(${varName})}" /> <f:ajax event="afterDelete" listener="#{${backingBean}.${afterDelete}(${varName})}" /> <f:ajax event="beforeCancel" listener="#{${backingBean}.${beforeCancel}(${varName})}" /> <f:ajax event="afterCancel" listener="#{${backingBean}.${afterCancel}(${varName})}" />
<z:sortOptions> <z:sortOption label="#{${msgs}.${keySort}}" sortExpression="${propertyOfVar} ASC" /> </z:sortOptions>
<z:card id="${idCard}" template="${templateCard}" />
<z:inlineForm id="${idInlineForm}" > <z:card id="${idCardInLine}" template="${tempalteCardInLine}" /> </z:inlineForm>
</z:cardlist>
